description: React component for frontend application establishing a simple UI to fetch and display a 'Hello World' message from an API endpoint (/hello). The file includes logic for API call handling, state management, and rendering different UI states based on fetch results.

methods.name: formatError
methods.description: Formats an unknown error into a user-friendly string.

methods.name: fetchHello
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the /hello endpoint of the backend API and returns the parsed JSON response.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders the user interface, manages state, and invokes API calls.
